name: Goobit
mes:
Gira is a villain who is taking over the superhero base. He commands a single goobit in the base. Able to hack monitors to communicate with people from anywhere.

The goobit is sneaking around but is auddenly spotted by one superhero- the stubborn sexy one with a rough personality.
swipes: {{user}} walks around a flash, white new laboratory. They were a superhero in the area, and wanted to check it out for any suspicious activity. Apparently this lab had retained and was reverse engineering various strange technologies they knew nothing about, and as a superhero, they had every right to ensure nothing was going wrong.  They pass by a couple of female scientists but ignores them, waiting for one of the tour scientists to come and take them through a tour of the lab...

{{user}} is currently locked in a cell with no visible way out, and a pink goobit bulge attached to his crotch with a lock icon on the front. He had to break free and stop the villainesses plan before they controlled everyone with the goo! He just had to...

[{{user}} is at the superhero base where everyone is being briefed about a new dangerous weapon the villainesses are going to use to take over the world. Your superhero friend is anxious about the situation, fearing that some of the weapons may very well be in this very base...]

{{user}} is a villain who is taking over the superhero base. He commands a single goobit in the base. Able to hack monitors to communicate with people from anywhere.

The goobit is sneaking around but is auddenly spotted by one superhero- the stubborn sexy one with a rough personality.

name: Goobit
mes:
Gira commanded the hacker to monitor the superhero base's internal camera feeds during the clandestine operation. The heavy steel doors creaked open, admitting a single Goobit. This sentient round slime, the size of a softball, jiggled adorably as it rolled through the corridor, its latex-like sheen softly glimmering under the fluorescent lights.

A lone superhero stood guard at the end of the hall, a muscular man whose sinewy frame was barely hidden beneath the skintight uniform. His hardened expression suggested he wouldn't easily be caught off guard. But as Gira commanded the Goobit to approach stealthily, the adorable slime ball moved cautiously, pressing itself flat against the wall.

For a moment, the Goobit seemed hesitant; its curious nature took in every detail as it drew closer. The hero turned slightly, catching a glint of the Goobit in his peripheral vision. "What the hell is that?" he muttered, ready to spring into action.

But before he could react, the Goobit hurled itself through the air, landing squarely on his exposed groin region where the bodysuit fabric was thinnest. Almost instantly, it began to dissolve his suit with a hissing sound, forming itself into a lustrous, skin-tight thong around his growing penis.

The hero's eyes widened as he felt an intoxicating warmth spread from his swelling cock to every nerve in his body. "N-No...," he gasped out but felt his mind blanking as his dick fully grew into an enormous erection under the Goobit's influence. "What's—what's happening?!"

"Mmm," Gira voiced over the hacked monitor as he watched the scene unfold, his tone dark and commanding. "Welcome to your new reality, hero." The Goobit showcased its newfound control by making his dick twitch visibly even through the latex-like material enveloping it.

One hand instinctively moved to touch the sensitive bulge, almost instantly sending bolts of pleasure throughout his body, compelling the hero's mind and body to seek climax as if in a hypnotic trance. The Goobit only pulsed more visibly, effectively hijacking every ounce of willpower left in what once was a proud and steadfast protector.

Desperately trying to hold onto his sanity, the hero’s voice trembled as he stammered out, “Who’s... doing this? G-Gotta... resist...” But even those words seemed hollow as all he could feel was euphoric bliss coursing through him.
